version_description:
New content ‘Wanted’ added! Catch powerful bosses and earn rewards!

'Domination' is reset every week. Renewal of 'Domination'!

Deliver an unavoidable attack! New passive skill 'Armor Break' added!

New content ‘Wanted’ added! Catch powerful bosses and earn rewards!

'Domination' is reset every week. Renewal of 'Domination'!

Deliver an unavoidable attack! New passive skill 'Armor Break' added!
Bug fixes and content balance adjustments
Bug fixes and content balance adjustments

Let's ride through the battlefield on horseback! New content 'WAR HORSE' added!

A sharper attack power! Boss attack with 'HYPER CRIT RATE'!

Let's play more strategically with 5 new 'HERO'!

Added a new passive 'BLOOD POWER' that converts Hp into Attack power!

Let's ride through the battlefield on horseback! New content 'WAR HORSE' added!

A sharper attack power! Boss attack with 'HYPER CRIT RATE'!

Let's play more strategically with 5 new 'HERO'!

Added a new passive 'BLOOD POWER' that converts Hp into Attack power!

Let's run towards the best in a new battlefield! New server ‘Jangan S2’ opened!

For a more comfortable game! Significantly improved UI/UX!

They give you legendary equipment unconditionally?! Special Events in Store!

Let's take a look at the special relationship of heroes! 'DESTINY' added!

Honor to those who occupy the strongest position! Main screen  improvement!
